About Me

An aspiring full stack web developer, Knowledgable of front-end development. I love to work in collaborative project.

I have done my Mechanical Engineering. Later on, IT Sector's growth cought my interest and I transformed myself as a Full Stack Web Developer.

Currently I am working in TCS Pune as an Assistent System Engineer post with a project in .NET technology but I want to expertise myself as a Full Stack Web Developer in the upcoming years with React JS technology.
